title: Faggot Dinosaur
description: A collection of art and writing published by Writers Among Artists on the theme "Faggot Dinosaur". Contributors include: Resa Alboher, Mario Ashkar, Jen Benka & Carol Mirakove, Denise Bilbao, Cooper Lee Bombardier, Lisa Brown, Clint Catalyst, Justin Chin, Lucy Corin, Carmella Suzanne Fleming, Leora Fridman, Nicole J. author: Ali Liebegott
